chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: Type
s: SF_seq

Goal:
size (SF_lx s) = S (size (SF_ly s))

Premises:
SF_lx = fun s : SF_seq => SF_h s :: unzip1 (SF_t s) : SF_seq -> seq R
size = fun T : Type => fix size (s : seq T) : nat := match s with | [::] => 0%nat | _ :: s' => S (size s') end : forall T : Type, seq T -> nat Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope seq_scope]
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
SF_ly = fun s : SF_seq => unzip2 (SF_t s) : SF_seq -> seq T
size_rcons : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T) (x : T), size (rcons s x) = S (size s)
index_mem : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (x : eqtype.Equality.sort T) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), ssrnat.leq (S (index x s)) (size s) = (x \in s)
size_undup : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), ssrnat.leq (size (undup s)) (size s)
size_take : forall (n0 : nat) (T : Type) (s : seq T), size (take n0 s) = (if ssrnat.leq (S n0) (size s) then n0 else size s)
size_drop : forall (n0 : nat) (T : Type) (s : seq T), size (drop n0 s) = ssrnat.subn (size s) n0
size_takel : forall (n0 : nat) (T : Type) (s : seq T), ssrnat.leq n0 (size s) -> size (take n0 s) = n0
size_ncons : forall (T : Type) (n : nat) (x : T) (s : seq T), size (ncons n x s) = ssrnat.addn n (size s)
size_rem : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (x : eqtype.Equality.sort T) (s : seq_predType T), x \in s -> size (rem (T:=T) x s) = Init.Nat.pred (size s)
SF_make : forall (lx : seq R) (ly : seq T), size lx = S (size ly) -> SF_seq
size_incr_nth : forall (v : seq nat) (i : nat), size (incr_nth v i) = (if ssrnat.leq (S i) (size v) then size v else S i)
nth_last : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T), nth x0 s (Init.Nat.pred (size s)) = last x0 s
size_set_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (n : nat) (y : T), size (set_nth x0 s n y) = ssrnat.maxn (S n) (size s)
ltn_size_undup : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), ssrnat.leq (S (size (undup s))) (size s) = ~~ uniq s
size_cat : forall (T : Type) (s1 s2 : seq T), size (s1 ++ s2) = ssrnat.addn (size s1) (size s2)
last_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 x : T) (s : seq T), last x s = nth x0 (x :: s) (size s)
size_belast : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : seq T), size (seq.belast x s) = size s
size_compat : forall s : seq R, Rlength (seq2Rlist s) = size s
seq_step = fun s : seq R => foldr Rmax 0 (pairmap (fun x y : R => Rabs (y - x)) (head 0 s) (behead s)) : seq R -> R Argument scope is [seq_scope]
all_pred1P : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (x : eqtype.Equality.sort T) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), reflect (s = nseq (size s) x) (all (pred_of_simpl (T:=eqtype.Equality.sort T) (eqtype.pred1 x)) s)
nth_rcons : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (x : T) (n : nat), nth x0 (rcons s x) n = (if ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) then nth x0 s n else if eqtype.eq_op n (size s) then x else x0)
take_oversize : forall (T : Type) (n : nat) (s : seq T), ssrnat.leq (size s) n -> take n s = s
drop_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (n : nat) (s : seq T), ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) -> drop n s = nth x0 s n :: drop (S n) s
size_allpairs_dep : forall (S : Type) (T : S -> Type) (R : Type) (f : forall x : S, T x -> R) (s : seq S) (t : forall x : S, seq (T x)), size [seq f x y | x <- s, y <- t x] = sumn [seq size (t x) | x <- s]
lastI : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : seq T), x :: s = rcons (seq.belast x s) (last x s)
perm_size : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (s1 s2 : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), perm_eq s1 s2 -> size s1 = size s2
mask_cat : forall (T : Type) (m1 m2 : bitseq) (s1 s2 : seq T), size m1 = size s1 -> mask (m1 ++ m2) (s1 ++ s2) = mask m1 s1 ++ mask m2 s2
seq_step_cat : forall x y : seq R, (0 < size x)%nat -> (0 < size y)%nat -> last 0 x = head 0 y -> seq_step (x ++ behead y) = Rmax (seq_step x) (seq_step y)
unzip1 = fun S T : Type => map fst : forall S T : Type, seq (S * T) -> seq S Arguments S, T are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope seq_scope]
size_map : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1), size [seq f i | i <- s] = size s
sorted_dec : forall (s : seq R) (x0 x : R), sorted Rle s -> head x0 s <= x <= last x0 s -> {i : nat | nth x0 s i <= x < nth x0 s (S i) /\ (S (S i) < size s)%nat} + {nth x0 s (size s - 2) <= x <= nth x0 s (size s - 1)}
